text: Makotoni ware wa, michibiki to shite kōmyō no aru rippō o,(mu - sā ni)-ka shita. Sorede (arrā ni) fukujū, kie shita yogen-sha-tachi wa, kore ni yotte yudayahito o sabaita. Seishoku-sha-tachi ya rippōgakusha-tachi mo (sabaita). Arrā no keiten no goji o takusa rete itakaradearu. Kare-ra wa sore ni taisuru shōnin demo atta. Dakara anata gata wa ningen o osorezu, tada ware o osore nasai. Wazukana daika de, ware no shirushi o utte wa naranai. Soshite arrā ga kudasa reta monode saiban shinai mono wa fushinjin-sha (kāfiru)dearu
